Token.Abstract: Provides useful extensions to the UIImage interface.
Creates and returns an image object by loading the image data from the file at the specified path appropriate for the resolution of the device.

Parameter.Name: path
Parameter.Abstract: The full or partial path to the file, possibly including an @2x retina image.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new image object for the specified file, or an image for the @2x version of the specified file, or nil if the method could not initialize the image from the specified file.

Token.Abstract: Initializes an image object by loading the image data from the file at the specified path appropriate for the resolution of the device.

Parameter.Name: path
Parameter.Abstract: The full or partial path to the file, possibly including an @2x retina image.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The initialized image object for the specified file, or for the @2x version of the specified file, or nil if the method could not initialize the image from the specified file.
